Submodules

CausalLearning.model_validation_protocols.MVP_ProtocolBase module

class MVP_ProtocolBase[source]

Bases: object

A base class for running protocols for causal discovery algorithms.

The Protocol class provides a base for implementing different protocols for causal discovery algorithms. This class should not be instantiated directly, instead use one of the available protocols like KFoldCV.

set_params(parameters)[source]

Sets the parameters of the protocol.

Parameters: parameters (dict): A dictionary of parameters to set for the protocol.

Returns: None

run_protocol(data, algorithm, parameters, n_jobs=1)[source]

Runs the protocol.

Returns: The results of the protocol in array format
